QuestData.Title: Heart of the Watcher
QuestData.Description: You have found what appears to be the heart of a harvest watcher.$B$BFrom the sound being emitted by the device you can tell that it's still fully functional. Perhaps you should return it to Farmer Saldean.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the Harvest Watcher Heart to Farmer Saldean at Saldean's Farm.
QuestData.RewardText: Is that... Is that the heart of one of the watchers? I've heard stories about using one of these to power up a watcher for personal use. Of course I'm really in no shape to try such things myself.
